introduction.title: Why are you here?
introduction.remark: You want to laugh or what?
introduction.paragraph1: If the answer is “yes”, <1> so sorry </1> that's not the place.

buttonMessages.message2: I want to laugh, press again!
buttonMessages.message4: This is the last time, I promise!

leadInMain.heading: What is Bite of Humor?
leadInMain.paragraph: Bite of Humor is a digital experience crafted to inject a quick, clever dose of laughter into your day. Blending design with humor, it offers curated jokes, playful interactions, and creative content that aim to entertain while challenging the ordinary. It's not just about making you laugh—it's about making you think, smile, and enjoy the unexpected.

unitedStates.title: United States
unitedStates.body: An American eagle on grill duty? A superhero zipping by on a scooter? A tiny horse for a tiny cowboy? This scene's got more layers than a deep-fried Twinkie. What's the punchline in this stars-and-stripes spectacle?

france.title: France
france.body: A baguette taking Eiffel Tower selfies? A mime trapped in an invisible box that's actually moving? A duck in a beret quacking about the intricacies of cheese? This scene is so French, it's practically sweating croissants.

germany.title: Germany
germany.body: Bratwurst-powered robots competing for the most punctual delivery? A garden gnome leading a rebellion against kitsch? An engineer trying to explain humor with precision? This scene is more orderly than a freshly mown lawn on a Sunday morning.

classicJokes.heading: Classic Jokes
classicJokes.paragraph: Enjoy a collection of timeless jokes! These are the tried-and-true classics that have been shared and chuckled over for generations, often with familiar setups and satisfying punchlines.

surrealAbsurdity.heading: Surreal Absurdity
surrealAbsurdity.paragraph: Step into the bizarre and illogical! These jokes embrace the unexpected and nonsensical, where the humor comes from the delightful violation of reality and the sheer absurdity of the situation.

dadJokes.heading: Dad Jokes
dadJokes.paragraph: Get ready for the signature blend of corniness and puns! These dad jokes feature slightly longer setups that build anticipation for the inevitably groan-worthy (yet sometimes charming) punchline. You've been warned!

mainText.line1: Tell us a joke to enter.
mainText.line2: Make us laugh, or at least try.

introduction.heading: Claim Your Spotlight
introduction.paragraph: Don't let those punchlines go unheard. Sign up now to build your comedian profile, share your best material, and connect with a community that loves to laugh.

introduction.heading: Returning legend? Log in to keep the mic
introduction.paragraph: A satire-powered playground blending cultural wit and creative rebellion — discover the story, the mission, and why laughter hits harder when it's honest.

introduction.heading: Choose Your Global Stage!
introduction.paragraph: Bite of Humor connects you with comedy from every corner. Tell us where you want to start your humor journey.

leadIn.heading: Welcome to Bite of Humor
leadIn.paragraph: Your setup is complete! Explore the different sections of your personalized humor experience.

communicationHub.title: Communication Hub
communicationHub.description: Stay connected with your joke community

socialFeatures.title: Social Features
socialFeatures.description: Connect and share with fellow joke enthusiasts

premiumExperience.title: Premium Experience
premiumExperience.description: Unlock advanced features and exclusive content

dashboardCard.title: Quick Access Dashboard
dashboardCard.body: Jump directly to your favorite platform features
